params.asset: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve

returns.currentATokenBalance: The current AToken balance of the user
returns.currentStableDebt: The current stable debt of the user
returns.currentVariableDebt: The current variable debt of the user
returns.liquidityRate: The liquidity rate of the reserve
returns.principalStableDebt: The principal stable debt of the user
returns.scaledVariableDebt: The scaled variable debt of the user
returns.stableBorrowRate: The stable borrow rate of the user
returns.stableRateLastUpdated: The timestamp of the last update of the user stable rate
returns.usageAsCollateralEnabled: True if the user is using the asset as collateral, false         otherwise

getUserReserveData(address,address).notice: Returns the user data in a reserve
